name: Walking Statue
description: The Walking Statue is a large construct, built with formidable strength, resembling a typical statue until it moves. It has a robust armor and a solid pool of hit points, giving it durability in combat. Its appearance is unassuming until activated or attacked.
memorable: The statue can blend into its surroundings and ambush adventurers, only revealing its true nature when it springs to life.
goals: Typically tasked with guarding treasures or specific locations.
relations: Can serve alongside other constructs or creatures that require protection.
environment: Often found in locations where it protects valuable treasures.
strengths: Exceptional melee attacks due to high strength and constitution; immune to poison and psychic damage.
weaknesses: Low dexterity results in poor agility and initiative; easily affected by bludgeoning damage.
attacks: Uses powerful melee attacks called 'Smash' that deal significant bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Has a bludgeoning weakness that causes it to fall prone when taking excessive bludgeoning damage.
senses: Has blindsight up to 60 ft., allowing it to detect creatures nearby even without sight.
additional_information: Immune to a wide range of conditions.
Falls prone when receiving more than 10 bludgeoning damage from a single attack.
Can camouflage as a normal statue when motionless.
Can be destroyed by successful casting of dispel magic at a high difficulty.
Offers strategic challenges in combat due to its unique abilities.
test_queries: motionless statue that can become dangerous
